data.script:
<script>
    import {Box, Portal} from "@kahi-ui/framework";

    let container = null;
</script>

<Box
    bind:element={container}
    palette="accent"
    padding="small"
>
    I am the new container element!
</Box>

<Portal target={container}>
    <Box padding="small">And I was moved to here!</Box>
</Portal>
data.title: Portal Preview
